name: rental-search
description: Chrome extension which allows you to watch for proper offer inside sites like gumtree and olx using filters. Application based on React.

scripts.build: npm run clear-dist && parcel build app/index.html app/background.ts --out-dir dist --no-source-maps && npm run zip-package
scripts.build-dev: npm run clear-dist && parcel build app/index.html app/background.ts --out-dir dist --no-minify

author: Kemal Erdem
